I also get it trying to define and modify a new launching configuration for an
external builder.

Hmmmm.. reviewing the code I don't see how this can happen and I cannot 
reproduce with our external tool builders or creating a new one. 
Does it always happen? Is it on a project I can get to attempt to reproduce?
I get it all the time.

The only way I see that this could happen is if an InvocationTargetException 
is occuring. We do not handle this.

Fixed in AntTargetsTab to gracefully fail in these cases and to log the 
exception(s).
